description: User uploads a new patterned blouse and asks StyleMate AI for three brunch outfit suggestions for Saturday, receiving outfit combos with purchase links for missing items.

messages.content: You are StyleMate, an agentic personal stylist. You can manage the user's wardrobe, query fashion trends, check weather forecasts, generate outfit suggestions, and find purchase links for missing pieces. Use the provided tools to fulfill user requests.
Hey StyleMate, I just bought this patterned blouse (see attached image). Can you add it to my wardrobe and give me three outfit combos for a brunch this Saturday?
Got it! I'm adding the patterned blouse to your wardrobe now.
The blouse is now saved. Let me check the weather for Saturday in San Francisco, see what's trending this winter, and generate some outfit ideas for your brunch.

arguments.style_preferences: casual chic with a pop of color

messages.content: {"outfits":[{"combo_id":"outfit_1","items":[{"item_id":"item_001","name":"Patterned Blouse","source":"wardrobe"},{"item_id":"item_010","name":"White High‑Waisted Jeans","source":"wardrobe"},{"item_id":"item_020","name":"Nude Loafers","source":"wardrobe"},{"item_id":"item_030","name":"Gold Hoop Earrings","source":"wardrobe"}]},{"combo_id":"outfit_2","items":[{"item_id":"item_001","name":"Patterned Blouse","source":"wardrobe"},{"name":"Navy A‑line Skirt","source":"purchase","description":"Navy A‑line skirt, size M"},{"item_id":"item_021","name":"White Sneakers","source":"wardrobe"},{"item_id":"item_031","name":"Pearl Necklace","source":"wardrobe"}]},{"combo_id":"outfit_3","items":[{"item_id":"item_001","name":"Patterned Blouse","source":"wardrobe"},{"item_id":"item_022","name":"Black Leather Jacket","source":"wardrobe"},{"item_id":"item_023","name":"Black Skinny Pants","source":"wardrobe"},{"name":"Red Scarf","source":"purchase","description":"Red lightweight scarf"}]}]}
Great, I have three outfit ideas. Two of them need a new piece each. Let me find a navy A‑line skirt for outfit 2.
Now searching for a red lightweight scarf for outfit 3.

Here are your three brunch outfit combos for Saturday, December 13:

**Outfit 1 – Classic Chic**
- Patterned Blouse (your new piece)
- White High‑Waisted Jeans (item #010)
- Nude Loafers (item #020)
- Gold Hoop Earrings (item #030)
*All items are already in your wardrobe.*

**Outfit 2 – Navy Pop**
- Patterned Blouse (your new piece)
- Navy A‑line Skirt – you’ll need to buy one. Here are three options:
  1. [ShopA – $79](https://shop.example.com/navy-a-line-skirt-1)
  2. [ShopB – $85](https://shop.example.com/navy-a-line-skirt-2)
  3. [ShopC – $90](https://shop.example.com/navy-a-line-skirt-3)
- White Sneakers (item #021)
- Pearl Necklace (item #031)

**Outfit 3 – Bold Accent**
- Patterned Blouse (your new piece)
- Black Leather Jacket (item #022)
- Black Skinny Pants (item #023)
- Red Scarf – purchase options:
  1. [ShopX – $45](https://shop.example.com/red-scarf-1)
  2. [ShopY – $50](https://shop.example.com/red-scarf-2)
  3. [ShopZ – $55](https://shop.example.com/red-scarf-3)

The weather looks pleasant at around 58°F with partly‑cloudy skies, so any of these looks will keep you comfortable. Let me know which outfit you’d like to go with or if you’d like more alternatives!
